website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for mothers who want a portable electric breast pump, but it may not be ideal for long-term pumping.
pros: A lightweight model that is straightforward and easy to use
Portable and convenient for mothers on the go
cons: Suction is not as strong as some other electric models

customer_reviews.title: Good for occassional use, but not for every day use.
customer_reviews.text: Great for pumping while away from the house. I wouldn't use it every day because it can be a bit painful if you don't adjust the power to the lowest level before starting pumping, but once you get the hang of it, it's a lifesaver. I have pumped using this in a parking lot without anyone being the wiser.
customer_reviews.author: Monica W.

customer_reviews.title: As first I was hesitant to purchase a pump online ...
customer_reviews.text: As first I was hesitant to purchase a pump online, but felt re-assured after seeing the dozens of positive reviews floating around online. The product itself comes bundles with a suction kit, tubing, a storage bottle, variable nipple set, and the power adapter. Everything works amazingly and I've had no issues over the past few weeks of constantly using this breast pump.
customer_reviews.author: guanyubang

customer_reviews.title: only good for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using the pump it was very effective and I was pulling about 2.5 ounces per side. Less than a month later it was only pumping out maybe 1 ounce per side and the pump sounded like it was dying. Mind you, I pumped every day, sometimes 5 times that day so it may be better as a back up pump or for the occasional use (like just in the mornings for your backup supply). But it was also super easy to return, no hassles, and they refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Very strong suction!
customer_reviews.text: This pump is pretty handy! I've used it while going on long road trips and the suction is a lot more powerful than Madela. The only thing I wasn't a fan of was when turning it on every time, it would reset to the very strong setting in which caught me off guard and hurt. I typically start at the lowest setting and then increase gradually.
customer_reviews.author: G_mom

customer_reviews.title: Good travel option
customer_reviews.text: I have used a spectra S2 every day for five months and was very happy with it but it doesn't have a battery option. I found the Bellema mango here on amazon and figured it would be a good option for an international trip, and I am very happy with it. I like that it can be plugged in or use batteries. No complaints about the pump, but I did use a different brand of bottle to pump into because the one that comes with it is very small.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea C.

customer_reviews.title: Best pump
customer_reviews.text: This was an awsome pump. I was afraid that I wouldn't get milk out from it because I heard so many stories (about other big name brands) where people would pump and little to nothing came out. This was great. It keeps the time for you so you can pump for the 30min you should be doing. Along with it the pump speed and pressure you have control over. I would have to say this got more milk out then the one the insurance companies give you for "free".
customer_reviews.author: rayray68

customer_reviews.title: ONE POWERFUL LITTLE FUDGER
customer_reviews.text: I used this pump as my travel pump, specially for driving and I was starting to feel a rock on my breast knowing it was mastitis. I was driving needing to drive and pump and I didn’t realized I had left it in the strongest setting and lord and behold! It pulled the plug out! It hurt like a mofo! I would totally buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Karina McHenry

customer_reviews.title: I made sure it works before sending it and when I turned it on it looked like the suction was pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my sister in law that lives in another country. I made sure it works before sending it and when I turned it on it looked like the suction was pretty good. It was easy to operate and it's awesome that besides the power adapter it also takes AA batteries. If I have another baby some day I'll probably buy this pump for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tat

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: This broke after the first time i used it. bought it to take on vacation - what a waste. i really wanted it to be good. but you need a lot of power for pumping! lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: MotherOfAxel

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I EBF and don't usually pump since I stay home with my kids.. I bought this pump for emergency cases like if need to go somewhere and can't bring my little one .. this pump is wonderful.. it really did its job well and pumped 3-4oz at a time per breast. Would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: purplebeach

customer_reviews.title: Great success!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 12 days earlier than was quoted - very happy! Was excited to try this right away. First pump went very well! Excellent suction and power, works beautifully. Would definitely recommend to others. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Olive Juice

customer_reviews.title: Great portable pump
customer_reviews.text: Good pump! Only this is on the batteries it’s not very sting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is Okay...But Won't buy Again
customer_reviews.text: It did Okay at 1st, but it isn't even close to Medela. I used at night for awhile for quieter pumper, but it wasn't even close to Medela performance.
customer_reviews.author: Mother_of_2_FL

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done I was skeptical at first but ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done I was skeptical at first but after using this breast pump I'm loving it. Within half hour I have 10 ounces of milk.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works wouders for me! Only one ive gotten to actually work well for me having biger breast!
customer_reviews.author: LuDene Valencia

customer_reviews.title: works great for on the go
customer_reviews.text: works great for on the go, great second pump! I use it in the car with the adapter. I will pump on the way to dinner and have 5-6oz in less than 30 min.
customer_reviews.author: S. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Good pump
customer_reviews.text: I've had this three months. So far so good. I've used ameda for two years and this one works just as well. It is a bit noisy, but I've got a hand pump for on thego. Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This was my 2nd pump. Wonderful comfort and easy to use. Lasted the duration of my breast feeding. 8 months. Still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Maze

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: at first i was very skeptical with purchasing this product but i must say its an amazing product and works quite well for me. No regrets at all
customer_reviews.author: Eka Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I bought this as a back up to my Tommee Tippee double electric pump. This pump far exceeds my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Melynn715

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: The wifey loved it. great product and much cheaper than the competitors
customer_reviews.author: Fouad Tarazi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size for travel. Not too noisy and works comparable to my stationary home pump.
customer_reviews.author: KRYS

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the Medela, but much cheaper
customer_reviews.text: The only downside is that it's impossible to buy parts in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouse

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just one small issue
customer_reviews.text: This pump works amazing, very convenient and can be used anywhere. The only issue I had was the fact that you cant increase the speed and suction at the same time. Even with that issue though, I would still purchase the product again.
customer_reviews.author: Samm

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully, would have gotten 5 stars but I'm unable ...
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully, would have gotten 5 stars but I'm unable to buy extra parts thru bellema or amazon and the batteries only last for about 5 pump sessions.
customer_reviews.author: justine mckenna

customer_reviews.title: My wife love to use it
customer_reviews.text: My wife love to use it. It's quite comfortable to compared to the one that i've bought for her before.
customer_reviews.author: Syahrin

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work/was defective upon arrival. The cap for the bottle included, didn't fit. The unit would not power off when batteries were inserted. Neither the box nor the paperwork in the box had any contact number for customer service. After some time sleuthing online for it (time better spent with my newborn, I might add) I found it and the service was, inappropriate. When the product did turn on, it was loud and weirdly embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna F

customer_reviews.title: I'm able to extract a good amount of milk pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I'm able to extract a good amount of milk pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Comfortable, portable, not to loud, easy to use. I like the two settings stimulation and expression. I like how I can control the suction and speed. :) good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great the only complain that I have is that it's loud other then that it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: vivian marin

customer_reviews.title: Im very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Im very satisfied with this product. It's easy to use and works great. I tried a breastpump Avent and they are similar.
customer_reviews.author: memenores

customer_reviews.title: I love the display screen which helps me with keeping track ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my LIRR commute in NYC. It's definitely audible but who cares. I love the display screen which helps me with keeping track of time. I used to lug my slightly bigger Medela in style advanced with me but this is a very good substitute, esp when a couple of pounds makes a big difference in your city life commuting.
customer_reviews.author: Momable Me

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good at all Easy clean , less noise , enough suction force .
customer_reviews.author: Dr.ahmed

customer_reviews.title: very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Just tried this out today and so far, very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: MEH
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this pump so badly, but I just can't. There are two major things wrong with it: 1) the speed/suction control functions "simultaneously" so it's impossible to get the exact speed and suction that you want and 2) it KILLS batteries so fast! I think it can go about 1.5 - 2 weeks (that's 7- 15 pumps total). I purchased this pump to use 3x day during the work week and while it's comfortable (with the silicone shield) and compact, it could be SO MUCH BETTER. I'm not sure how it compares to other small battery operated pumps, since I invested in this one, it's what I'm stuck with.
customer_reviews.author: Pkent15

customer_reviews.title: Love it but...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a great pump so far. It has given me an extra ounce with the first use! There are a few things though. The pump is a bit loud for something so tiny, and it takes a little longer for me to pump. I also have a problem with adjusting the speed. You can switch between the expression and suction with no problem. You can also adjust the strength of those two setting, but I haven't been able to figure out how to adjust the speed. Once I figure that portion out, I may feel a bit better after that.
customer_reviews.author: Anissa A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pump is wonderful and its size is so convenient,the sound also is not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I needed a pump that was easy to take with me
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pump that was easy to take with me, and discreet so that I could use it at work and not announce to everybody what I’m doing. This is the perfect solution to my pumping problem; it’s light, I can take it with me in my purse, and the memory function remembers exactly how I want it to pump so that I don’t have to fiddle with all kinds of knobs or buttons so that I can get my pump going. It’s also really easy to clean, so I don’t have to spend hours after I get done or get home from work making sure everything is safe and clean. My favorite new accessory for a new mom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good pump! The shipping was super quick and the pump works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars- Amazing portable pump :)
customer_reviews.text: Amazing portable pump. I love this pump- I have a hospital grade pump, I use at home but it's difficult to carry when doing errands. I have a newborn and this pump has helped me increase my milk supply. I carry it everywhere and started using it to pump at night because it easier than setting up the hospital grade pump. I've only had it for a week, I'm hoping It will still be as efficient in a year or so. For $60, buy this pump you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This pump does the job however you can't use it with batteries. It doesn't come on with the batteries in it. What is that about?
customer_reviews.author: Paula dick

customer_reviews.title: Gentle pump
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and gentle. I have 2 other pumps and this is the only one that feels just like a baby... minus the clapping down of course. I also love the cover that clamps on to the breast shield, it's much better for travel and keeping the pump and my car clean.
customer_reviews.author: Asha P

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not enough suction for me. Seems to be of good quality material, but it was returned. I wouldn't recommend if you are producing lower amounts of milk.
customer_reviews.author: HZTandy

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This pump operation is dependent on a tiny little seal ring for the suction to work. If you lose the seal ring, you are out of luck. Do they sell replacement seal rings? Nope. Total waste of money. AND this tiny pump is ridiculously loud.
customer_reviews.author: Bria Larson

customer_reviews.title: Super small and effective but doesn't take batteries
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the mini, thinking that it might have a rechargeable battery built in - it doesn't. So in order to use the mini, you have to be plugged in somewhere, which was a deal-killer for me. However, I did test the pump out once using my Madela hoses and bottle (so cannot comment on the bottle or tubing) and it has really nice suction with varied speed/force for such a tiny little pump. I would not call it quiet, although it isn't quite as loud as my Madela Pump in Style. Am returning this in favor of the mango regular which is a little bigger, but which takes AA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: dcf

customer_reviews.title: This is stopped working all of the sudden. It was really good in earlier days. Better go for another good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is stopped working all of the sudden. It was really good in earlier days. Better go for another good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pump for home or travel - works great with Dr. Brown bottles!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent breast pump for home or on the go. It works very well with Dr. Brown bottles (with accompanying adapter) and is easy to clean, care for, and transport around. I am really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Returned before use
customer_reviews.text: Returned before use, midwife advised 'that will never be useful', much too underpowered.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy F

customer_reviews.title: Complicated
customer_reviews.text: Not clear in how to set up! too many parts
customer_reviews.author: Washeightma

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love this.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this since all the reviews were good. It has low suction. If you need high suction this is NOT the product for you. I can't use it since it doesn't drain me and that's the point while I'm away from my baby. I tried all the trouble shooting tips and its just the machine.
customer_reviews.author: G Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: So far it seems to work great, surprisingly powerful despite running on batteries
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. So far it seems to work great, surprisingly powerful despite running on batteries. The battery indicator did go down a bar from just one 15min pump session. So it will be interesting to see how long batteries last. Got 2oz (60ml) out on first pump while BF my daughter on the other side. Purchased to help build up freezer stash to pump while feeding without being tied down to a pump plug. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: NurseTD

product_meta.title: Bellema Mango Plus Portable Single Electric Breast Pump with LCD Display
product_meta.description: Size:Mango PlusBELLEMA Mango Plus Single Electric Breast Pump BELLEMA is committed to providing superior quality breast pumps and breastfeeding accessories to enhance mothers nursing experience. Our design and develop are backed by a dedicated R&D team includes over 20 experts. By combining years of expertise and reputation, we have gain trust from nursing mothers around the world. What's in the Box 1 Breastpump Motor Unit 1 Breast Suction Kit with Tubing 1 Storage Bottle 1 Bottle Adapter 1 Bottle Base 1 Nipple Set 1 Power Adapter 1 User Manual & Warranty Card Warranty Information The BELLEMA Mango Plus Single Electric Breast Pump is backed by a 1-year limited warranty from the date of purchase against defective material and workmanship.
feature_bullets: 2-phase pumping: stimulation & expression, 9 adjustable vacuum power up to 320 mbar
Lightweight and portable can be powered by 4 x AA batteries, soft silicone cushion for gentle comfortable pumping
Closed system anti-backflow, LCD screen display provides real-time status, memory feature remembers preferred settings
Compatible with Philips AVENT natural/classic plus wide neck bottles, includes bottle adapter to convert to standard bottles like Dr Brown's
FDA approved, all parts are BPA free, one year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars96 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
